description: When Mateo Fernandez is out of commission after a muscle injury stunning Max Adonis rubs him down, working his sore muscles. Relaxing Mateo with his gifted hands, Max has an even better way to heal his pain...All he wants is Mateo's thick cock and he won't stop until he gets exactly that! title: Healing Touch, Scene #01
